18 Nathan Anderson

Position Right-Handed Pitcher

Height 6-4

Weight 215

Class Junior

Hometown Bondurant, Iowa

Highschool Bondurant-Farrar HS

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2024: Posted 2-5 record in 11 starts with one complete game, one combined shutout and 5.96 ERA...ranked second on the team in starts, innings pitched (54.1) and strikeouts (46)...allowed 68 hits and 39 runs (36 earned) with 13 walks...gave up just one hit in six innings work in season-opening start vs. Bemidji State (2/10/24)...fired complete-game six hitter vs. Minot State (3/30/24), allowing two runs with six strikeouts in 9-2 win...had six strikeouts in just five innings of work in no-decision start vs. Minnesota Crookston (2/22/24)...also had six strikeouts in start vs. Grand Valley State (3/10/24)...named to the NSIC Spring All-Academic Team.

2023: Ranked second on the team in starts (11), posting 3-4 record with 6.15 earned run average and one combined shutout...one of just two players on pitching staff to throw complete game, ranking second on team in strikeouts (51) in 52.2 innings pitched...struck out season-high nine batters in 6 1/3 innings work allowing just four hits and no runs in no-decision vs. Southwest Minnesota State (3/25/23)...had seven strikeouts in five inning start vs. Bemidji State, allowing just three runs in 16-6 win (4/8/23)...struck out seven batters in 5 2/3 innings scoreless start vs. Concordia-St. Paul, a 3-0 win on 4/23/23...fired complete game (eight innings) striking out six in 4-2 loss at Upper Iowa (4/15/23)...also pitched eight innings in NSIC Tournament game vs. Southwest Minnesota State (5/11/23)...repeat selection to the NSIC Spring All-Academic Team.

2022: Sat out season as a medical redshirt...named to the NSIC Spring All-Academic Team.

2021: Saw action in six games as a relief pitcher, going 0-0 with a 5.40 ERA (second-lowest on team)...pitched 6.2 innings and allowed nine hits and four runs with five strikeouts and three walks...struck out two batters in 1.1 innings of relief at Sioux Falls (4/17/21)...threw 1.1 innings of scoreless relief vs. Minot State (3/30/21)...had one inning of scoreless relief with one strikeout vs. Winona State (4/21/21).

High School: Graduate of Bondurant-Farrar High School in Iowa... was a three year starter in baseball and two year starter in basketball...as a junior, Anderson was 4-2 in 10 games with seven starts and a 2.73 ERA with 64 strikeouts in just 43 2/3 innings of work that included a no-hitter with 14 strikeouts...was a Raccoon River Conference honorable mention selection in 2019.

Personal: Son of Chad and Kristine Anderson...born March 13, 2002...majoring in business administration and sport management.
